testimonials.title: Customer Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: Our customers' satisfaction is our most important success indicator

customer1.name: Ayse Yilmaz
customer1.text: Working with ONUS was wonderful. Our kitchen turned out exactly as we imagined. Quality materials and excellent workmanship. I recommend them to everyone!

customer2.name: Mehmet Demir
customer2.text: We had custom furniture made for our office. The team was very professional, delivered on time and within budget. We are very satisfied with the result.

customer3.name: Zeynep Kaya
customer3.text: I confidently recommend ONUS to my clients. Their design approach is modern and functional. The 3D visualization service was very helpful.

customer4.name: Can Ozkan
customer4.text: The transformation of our bathroom was incredible! They used a small space very efficiently. We got a bathroom that is both modern and functional.

cta.title: Let's Design Your Dream Living Space Together
cta.subtitle: Contact us now for free inspection and consultation. Our expert team is ready to offer you the most suitable solutions.

about.title: About Us
about.description: As ONUS Kitchen & Bathroom, we offer special solutions that bring elegance and comfort to your living spaces where modern design and functionality meet.
about.content1: With our slogan "Nature's Apprentice, Master of Wood", we create custom designs by processing natural materials in the best way. Every project is a work of art for us.
about.content2: With years of experience and expertise in the industry, we turn your dream living spaces into reality. We offer quality materials, professional team and perfect workmanship guarantee.
